item.title: Rump Steak
item.description: weight 900g heat oven to 180C (top and bottom element) large thick bottomed stainless steel pan stove 6/10 sear, starting fat first, hold for 30 seconds on each side

item.title: Burning Water
item.description: I am not good at cooking I never really cared about cooking, which meant that my skills in cooking was limited to burning water. O_O
